column4: Search the forums for it, I believe he posted a location to the source somewhere
I have my own subforum for it. :)
That was quite creepy :) Hey, I think you know my roommate, g01dfish?
haha, yeah
goldfish woke up, save me!
from what?  His gentoo fanboyism?
hehe, he seems to be in this channel
You have a web site for your menu editor, right?
it's on the ubuntu forums
Kick goldfish a couple times for me. :)
My main argument for gnome is that it doesn't look like crap
I think he was demonstrating to goldfish the difference between /query and /msg
He's already got one.
nautilus is 400k lines of undebuggable crap. :P
I take it you've tried? heh
I've watched other try and fail and bitch and moan. I'm scared to look.
It's a good file manager, they just need to stop tacking on crap to it and fix the damn bugs
You don't get a new menu editor, btw. ;)
Why even put screenshots then :P
Well, there is nothing left to do for 0.5 in the app. I just need to figure out how to package PyXDG CVS and gnome-menus CVS from the 2.10 branch.
Because they fix xdg support bugs that my app exposes.
I was curious because there are some menu items I have that can't be edited.
Was that supposed to replace the default bittorrent client?
It probably did, yeah.
The command to run is /usr/bin/btdownloadgui.py
Yeah looks like it's still trying to use bittornado for me
When you run /usr/bin/btdownloadgui.py it open bittornado?
Removed it bittornado and it's good now.
Good, because you don't need bittornado anymore. :)
It's a good client but ugly as hell.
You click on the tray icon to make the window go away, click it again to bring it back.
Bittornado I mean
BitTorrent is so much better and looks good.
Doesn't look like there's any way to change the default port
Open up your firewall. ;)
It's very nice looking however I need to be able to change my ports.  I get TV shows from torrentbytes and they require an alternate port for who knows what reason.
I'll look into adding it. :)
This isn't my client, this is the official client. So it might take awhile if I can go it at all.
The new version of the official client?
yeah.
There has to be a conf file I can edit...
Oh shit, I feel stupid.  It lets you specify a starting port.  I think I'll use this client now :D
Like I said, it's perfect. :)
I'm inclined to agree, being a sort of a fan of clean GUIs.
go1dfish has a test in 30 minutes, he hasn't been to class since the last test, he hasn't studied, and he's currently asleep.  I blame you guys :P
lmao
I'll ban him from #pymusique if he fails. :D
Heh he won't, it's just a trivial 100 level astronomy class.
So far the only complaint about that bittorrent client is that it can't be resized.  Wouldn't it be fairly trivial to change this in pygtk?
Yeah, I could make the starting size the minimum size.
Cool.  I might have to learn python.  It appears to be rather simple and quick to boot.
I think that bittorrent 4.0 doesn't allow more than 3 simultaneous connections.  Perhaps this should be changed?
It doesn't?
Not connections, torrents I meant
Check the FAQ out
For this reason, BitTorrent allows up to three simulataneous torrents, however, running BitTorrent this way all the time is not recommended and will likely hurt BitTorrent's overall performance.
I'll look into it.
I may go digging through the code in a sec.  It may just be implemented as a constant.
I'll do it when I change the resize stuff.
In the config set advanced to true.
That'll make it resizeable at least.
What config?
~/.bittorrent/data/ui_config set advanced to 1
Looks like you can set min/max port in there too.
That'll give you lots of shiny info about the running torrents too, kinda cool.
I'll probably make the resize stuff a seperate option though.
Nice man.  Do all package maintainers put that much care into their packages?
Yeah, probably.
I'm not a good packager though, I don't have a diff.gz of my changes. :)
In the config it seems to say that max_files_open is set to 50...
That's probably files, not torrents.
For multi-file torrents.
Right
I'll dig into it when I redo this to be a good package.
Alright man, cool
advanced = 1 is doing some whacked out shit.  Wouldn't recommend it, ever.
Also it deleted the advanced=1 line after I restarted the app.
PING?
PONG
Kick goldfish for me, he broke something before he went to bed.
You want me to try and wake him up? crap.
hehe, please?
Granted he has a test in an hour and he he's been asleep for like two
I'll make sure he doesn't go to sleep after the test, heh.
Just wake him up a little early for the test so he gets on IRC. :)
Hurry he's partially awake, he wants to know what he broke?
he needs to chmod napster.tar.gz so the webserver can access it.
when he wakes up again :)
If I knew the root password I'd help you out.  But Alex isn't being very responsive.  So maybe you'll see him again in about 6 hours or so.
Has go1dfish been online at all in the past 18 hours?  He's sick or something.  Went to bed around 9:00, and he's still asleep now.
I'm not sure.
I'd better make sure he's asleep and that's not actually his rotting corpse...
heh
pour water on his face
Whats the address to your website?  I lost it yet again
http://www.realistanew.com
Aha, new menu editor.  Looks great.
